document.full_text: opec could next week agree its first formal increase in supply targets since 2007 when it meets to hammer out its response to arab world turmoil, extreme market volatility and pressure from the west for action.
document.title: output increase in the air as opec tackles turmoil
lines_and_colors: opec could next week agree its first formal increase in supply targets since 2007 when it meets to hammer out its response to arab world turmoil, extreme market volatility and pressure from the west for action.
